cot_history.cot_text: Player_2, it seems you're trying to deflect suspicion onto other players, but so far, your actions have been inconsistent. Yesterday, you voted for the Sheriff against Player_3 without providing any evidence against them. This pattern suggests that you might be a non-Mafia player, as your actions are more focused on protecting the Sheriff than identifying the Mafia. However, I need more concrete evidence to prove this suspicion.
cot_history.public_argument: Player_2, I'm not buying the sudden change in your behavior. You've been playing it too safe for too long. If you're really a Mafia player, wouldn't you have taken the time to gather evidence and prepare a strong case against the Sheriff? Your sudden vote against the Sheriff without any real reason or explanation raises more questions than answers.
